Question
========

The height of 10 people was determined in cm. The standard deviation of this sample is s = 8. If height is expressed in meters, then the standard deviation

Answerlist
----------

* 800
* 0.08
* 8
* 0.0008

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 800: Incorrect
* 0.08: Incorrect
* 8: Correct
* 0.0008: Incorrect
